title: visualization
description: AGV position and/or velocity for visualization purposes. Can be published at a higher rate if wanted. Since bandwidth may be expensive depening on the update rate for this topic, all fields are optional.

headerId.description: headerId of the message. The headerId is defined per topic and incremented by 1 with each sent (but not necessarily received) message.

z.description: Z coordinate of the AGV position in meters above the map's defined zero level. May be omitted if the AGV operates in a 2D plane.

roll.description: Roll of the AGV in radians. If AGV is not concerned with roll, this value may be omitted.

pitch.description: Pitch of the AGV in radians. If AGV is not concerned with pitch, this value may be omitted.

positionInitialized.description: True if the AGVs position is initialized, false, if position is not initizalized.

localizationScore.description: Localization score for SLAM based vehicles, if the AGV can communicate it.

deviationRange.description: Value for position deviation range in meters. Can be used if the AGV is able to derive it.

velocity.title: velocity
velocity.description: The AGVs velocity in vehicle coordinates

vz.description: The AGVs velocity in its z direction. May be omitted if the vehicle operates in a 2D plane.

pitchRate.description: The AVGs turning speed around its y axis. May be omitted if the vehicle is not concerned with pitch.

rollRate.description: The AVGs turning speed around its x axis. May be omitted if the vehicle is not concerned with roll.
